alert.note: Alert for Love (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:04AM CDT until June 08 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JOHNSTON...WESTERN BRYAN...EASTERN LOVE...SOUTHEASTERN CARTER AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1103 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nida to near Kingston to 4 miles east of Marietta, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Durant, Madill, Tishomingo, Marietta, Kingston, Dickson, Colbert, Mannsville, Ravia, Achille, Thackerville, Silo, Kemp, Mead, Armstrong, Hendrix, Cartwright, Utica, Blue and Overbrook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
